titles.title: To provide wage parity for certain Department of Defense prevailing rate employees in Georgia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Civil Service and Agency Organization.

bill.summary: 1/30/2001--Introduced. Requires the wage schedules and rates applicable to prevailing rate employees of the Department of Defense in the Macon, Georgia, wage area to be the same as the schedules and rates applicable to such employees in the Atlanta, Georgia, wage area.
